## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                         | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | (optional) Label of the news widget | `string` | `''`        |
| `rel`    | `rel`     | (optional) Link news widget rel     | `string` | `''`        |
| `styles` | `styles`  | (optional) Injected CSS styles      | `string` | `undefined` |
